channel.title: Gmo's Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content on Gmo's Personal Site

item.title: About Me
item.description: Background In the summer of 2018, I graduated from the University of South Florida with a bachelors in Humanities and Chemical Engineering. Junior year, I realized my passions for software while in “Numerical Methods” (A chemeE class that was required for the major). But by that time, it was already too late to change majors. The class taught the Matlab programming language. Even though Matlab sucks, learning how to program felt like learning how to do magic.

item.description: This is how you do it kids

item.title: Just a testing blog page
item.description: There’s nothing here Your probably on this page wondering to yourself why? Well you’re not alone. You see, I’ve been working on this site for way too damn long. Too damn long I tell ya. So I, just gotta publish it. I’m gonna fix it though. There’s a lot that needs to be done. Things that I need to do: Fix the blog list page huge ass footer. Fix the header link not highlighting while in a blog post.
